events.text: Wellcome, Dellborg. I'm Atlas and I will guide you through this journey. First, let me put into context what is going.
Basically you are our last hope to save Dell from the biggest financial crisis in history.
In 2050 (The year we are now, of course hehe) the world is collapsing, and the other companies are still the project model.
But we know that this model is outdated and that's why many of them are at rock.
Therefore, try hard. You are our last hope and we believe you!!!
To begin our journey, enter in Dell building, you can do that by pressing [color=#FF0000]E[/color] when you are in front of the main door. Let's go!!!!
